desc: A.MILD is targeting non-toxic with high-quality ingredients products from all over the world. We believe truly natural skincare is important, the myraid of synthetic and harmful chemicals in the majority of body care products may cause cancer, birth defects and genetic mutation or reproductive harm.

layout.text: Being artist and designer, we always deal with the nature of beauty and taste. A passion for beauty bring us together to explore new, special and healthy products. With years of experience, we are in good hands of sourcing Pure Ingredients, Natural and Organic products for different types of people.
